generalQuestions: Tell me about your relevant experience for this position.
Why are you interested in this role?
When would you be available to start?
Do you have any questions about the position or company?
What do you know about our company?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
What are your strengths and weaknesses?
Describe a challenging work situation and how you handled it.
Why are you leaving your current job?
technicalQuestions: How do you keep your technical skills up-to-date?
Explain a complex technical concept in simple terms.
How do you approach troubleshooting technical issues?
Tell me about a technical project you're proud of.
teamworkQuestions: How do you handle conflicts within a team?
How do you prioritize tasks when working on multiple projects?
Tell me about a time you had to collaborate with a difficult teammate.
How do you communicate technical concepts to non-technical colleagues?
leadershipQuestions: Tell me about a time you led a team through a challenging project.
How do you motivate team members?
How do you handle feedback and criticism?
